Package prkmodel.types.templates

Class DefaultNervousSystem

java.lang.Object
prkmodel.types.templates.DefaultNervousSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
NervousSystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
RepastNervousSystem
public class DefaultNervousSystem extends Object implements NervousSystem
Default implementation of the NervousSystem interface. Represents the nervous system with default behaviors and properties.

To implement a subclass:

  • Ensure the constructor properly initializes inherited fields.
  • Override methods to provide specific behavior.
  • Document the purpose of any new methods or overridden methods.
  • Use super to call the superclass method when overriding to extend or modify its behavior.

Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultNervousSystem

      public DefaultNervousSystem(int xdim, int ydim, int zdim, double mitoTransferThreshold, int lewyBodyDegenerationThreshold, double baseDegenerationProbability, int mitochondriaPerNeuron)
      Constructs a new DefaultNervousSystem with the specified dimensions and parameters.
      Parameters:
      xdim - the X dimension of the nervous system
      ydim - the Y dimension of the nervous system
      zdim - the Z dimension of the nervous system
      mitoTransferThreshold - the mitochondria transfer threshold
      lewyBodyDegenerationThreshold - the lewy body degeneration threshold
      baseDegenerationProbability - the base degeneration probability
      mitochondriaPerNeuron - the number of mitochondria per neuron
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any dimension is invalid
